sentences.english: There is a clause in the contract forbidding tenants to sublet .
sentences.chinese: 合同中有一條款禁止承租人轉租房屋。

sentences.english: Can I sublet my apartment when I'm away?
sentences.chinese: 當我不在的一段時間內，我可以轉租嗎？

sentences.english: The landlady found they had been illegally subletting the flat.
sentences.chinese: 女房東發現他們一直在違法轉租公寓。

sentences.english: Party B will not transfer the lease of the premises or sub without Party A's approval.
sentences.chinese: 未經甲方同意，乙方不得將承租的房屋轉租或分租。

sentences.english: I have sublet a flat to my friend for the summer.
sentences.chinese: 夏天我把一套公寓轉租給一個朋友。

sentences.english: Any room of the Leased Premises shall not be divided into sub-parts during subletting.
sentences.chinese: 但同一間居住房屋，不得分割轉租。
你不能把這套公寓轉租給他人。

sentences.english: Breene is sublets the garage from the Anne elder sister hand time and the Anne acquaintance.
sentences.chinese: 布林是從安妮姐姐手中轉租車庫的時候與安妮相識的。

sentences.english: So he adopted a policy of subleasing his properties to the franchisee.
sentences.chinese: 所以他採取了向經銷商轉租店面的手法。

sentences.english: Sublessee hereby agrees to accept possession of the Subleased Premises on an "AS IS" basis.
sentences.chinese: 轉租承租人在此同意按“現狀”驗收和入住轉租物業。

sentences.english: Sublessee hereby agrees to accept possession of the Subleased Premises on an "AS IS" basis.
sentences.chinese: 轉租承租人在此同意按“現狀”驗收和入住轉租物業。

sentences.english: The subtenant decided that the house needed some repairs and a paint job.
sentences.chinese: 轉租者認爲，房子需要進行一些維修和翻新。

sentences.english: The project is about an apartment to sublet in nyc.
sentences.chinese: 該項目是關於在紐約公寓轉租。

sentences.english: No. I'm afraid subletting the apartment isn't permitted.
sentences.chinese: 不可以，轉租房屋是不允許的。

sentences.english: Leasing activity here has greatly diminished while the sublease market has grown.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的租賃活動大大減少，而轉租市場的增長。

sentences.english: Whether you are permitted to rent the, place to someone else?
sentences.chinese: 你是否可以把房子轉租給別人。
